title: pakhitheboss
author: pakhitheboss
created_time: December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMLast edit: December 05, 2024, 01:54:19 PM by pakhitheboss
content: The new President of the USA recently posted the following statement on his own social media account known as Truth Social.It seems he is very much invested in Bitcoin, and this could trigger another bull run. News of him winning the election has already triggered a surge in Bitcoin's price. As a Bitcoin holder, I believe that a new rally is coming, and I anticipate that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $150,000 before the end of 2024.We've already seen how Bitcoin reached several new all-time highs as soon as the news broke out of the new President of the United States. The counting of votes is still going on in several states but the majority that he got suggests he is the new President of the USA. I am considering Trump as the new President of the US, who has the power to promote Bitcoin and make it a new option to USD. Do you think in the same way as me?

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: I can see that bitcoin reached 100k USD finally after some resistance and this indicates a bull run happening.Although the current president of USA has been an avid supporter of bitcoin, they are still politicians and while I share your enthusiasm about bitcoin's future, I take the indulgence of the politicians into bitcoin with a bag of salt.Only time can tell us if their support at the current stage is genuine or part of their plan to get rich.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMThe new President of the USA recently posted the following statement on his own social media account known as Truth Social.It seems he is very much invested in Bitcoin, and this could trigger another bull run. News of him winning the election has already triggered a surge in Bitcoin's price. As a Bitcoin holder, I believe that a new rally is coming, and I anticipate that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $150,000 before the end of 2024.In his interview after a video when he used bitcoin to buy something, he told that he was taught about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies by his children (or grandchildren too maybe). This means there are people in Trump family actually invested money in Bitcoin, cryptocurrencies.Does Trump invest his money in Bitcoin, I don't know, no information about it. But at least he revealed that his family have members who are Bitcoin investors, and cryptocurrency investors.The $100,000 psychological barrier was broken, and it's time for celebration. Coinmarketcap deployed a small avatar for Bitcoin $100,000 hours ago.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMAs a Bitcoin holder, I believe that a new rally is coming, and I anticipate that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $150,000 before the end of 2024.Do you think in the same way as me?I have once predicted $170000 which is still very possible. But I later think bitcoin may not get more than $149000. I still think bitcoin will be between $149000 and $170000 before the next bear market will begin.Quote from: TheUltraElite on December 05, 2024, 01:54:38 PMOnly time can tell us if their support at the current stage is genuine or part of their plan to get rich. Their support at this current stage is genuine even if some of their plans like bitcoin as strategic reserve fails if many Americans opposed it.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Trump is already taking the credit for the current price. With the current price, there are possibilities that the price will get to $150 before the end of the bull run. Another news that can move the price in this fashion is when he announces the move to make Bitcoin a reserve currency. That singular news will move the price to another ATH. Congratulations Bitcoiners.

comments.author: bigmanik
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMThe new President of the USA recently posted the following statement on his own social media account known as Truth Social.It seems he is very much invested in Bitcoin, and this could trigger another bull run. News of him winning the election has already triggered a surge in Bitcoin's price. As a Bitcoin holder, I believe that a new rally is coming, and I anticipate that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $150,000 before the end of 2024.We've already seen how Bitcoin reached several new all-time highs as soon as the news broke out of the new President of the United States. The counting of votes is still going on in several states but the majority that he got suggests he is the new President of the USA. I am considering Trump as the new President of the US, who has the power to promote Bitcoin and make it a new option to USD. Do you think in the same way as me?There's most definitely going to be another bull run for Bitcoin Especially when you consider the recent speech Putin made towards Bitcoin I believe that was actually the catalyst to Bitcoin hitting 100k Well, that Â aside, it's obvious that next year is going to be a great year for Bitcoin I can't wait to see how it goes Still have to give thanks to our President ðŸ«¡ðŸ«¡

comments.author: Swordsoffreedom
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PM As a Bitcoin holder, I believe that a new rally is coming, and I anticipate that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $150,000 before the end of 2024.The bull run is sure to continue as historically we are even just in the pre-bull phase, a bigger bull run is still ahead. Bitcoin hitting $100k in December took most of us by surprise as very few people thought it would happen. But we only have 1 month left of the year, is it too greedy to expect bitcoin to increase by 50%? I doubt this target.Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PM The counting of votes is still going on in several states but the majority that he got suggests he is the new President of the USA. I am considering Trump as the new President of the US, who has the power to promote Bitcoin and make it a new option to USD. Is the vote counting still going on? Because as far as I know, the Biden administration has invited Trump to the White House and both sides have planned for a peaceful transfer of power. Trump is definitely the 47th president of the United States, IMO.By the way, bitcoin will be a new option to gold, not USD.

comments.author: laijsica
comments.body: Quote from: TheUltraElite on December 05, 2024, 01:54:38 PMI can see that bitcoin reached 100k USD finally after some resistance and this indicates a bull run happening.Although the current president of USA has been an avid supporter of bitcoin, they are still politicians and while I share your enthusiasm about bitcoin's future, I take the indulgence of the politicians into bitcoin with a bag of salt.Only time can tell us if their support at the current stage is genuine or part of their plan to get rich. You have sparked a lot of important discussion. The continuous price increase that politicians have gone through for their comments and power seems like a scheme to get very rich. I think you should immerse yourself in continuous buying and DCA method to keep yourself hydrated with this price increase. Single buy and bullish time as an investor continue to buy on speculation and look for potential bears. In fact if you set a road map of $220k price prediction in 2025 then now is the right time to increase stashing and invest aggressively. Still waiting for the bull run which has already started.If this is part of getting rich then an investor should go with it.

comments.author: Felicity_Tide
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMDo you think in the same way as me?I don't know why he didn't make similar post on his X(Twitter) account, because I believe statements like this could definitely trigger the price further. We've all finally seen the $100K that we've been anticipating for, so the next question is, what's next?. Your anticipation of $150K is quite massive, but doesn't sound impossible, considering the fact that all the ATH that we've witnessed in the past one months where also impossible at some point until we crossed it.I have been enjoying the different price discovery lately, but I can't anticipate for anything above $120K till this year runs out. We know how though it was to see Bitcoin surpass the $100K price even though it was very close at some point. I will just stick with the $120K.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: The bull run is already here, and I don't anticipate or expect much from what we all are expecting from Bitcoin after his winnings. $150k is a price we can reach in due time; it's just a matter of time before we can get there.Â The push up yesterday to this morning was unpredictable for me, and it even moved to the level of $104k before I could even realise that we had touched $100k. If the pump continues with this speed, we might reach $110k even before we get to the 3rd week of this month.

comments.author: MusaPk
comments.body: We have already seen increase in price of Bitcoin after latest US presidential elections. President (Elect) Donald Trump is considered to be pro-Bitcoin and lot is expected from new president that he do legislation that will help in adoption of Bitcoin. If US govt do legislation that will allow use of cryptocurrency in USA then whole world will revise its policy towards cryptocurrency. It's a positive sign that President (Elect) has welcomed Bitcoin 100k$ price and if there are few more tweets like that from Mr. Trump then we might see 150k$ before the arrival of new year.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMIt seems he is very much invested in Bitcoin, and this could trigger another bull run. News of him winning the election has already triggered a surge in Bitcoin's price. As a Bitcoin holder, I believe that a new rally is coming, and I anticipate that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $150,000 before the end of 2024.We've already seen how Bitcoin reached several new all-time highs as soon as the news broke out of the new President of the United States. The counting of votes is still going on in several states but the majority that he got suggests he is the new President of the USA. I am considering Trump as the new President of the US, who has the power to promote Bitcoin and make it a new option to USD. Do you think in the same way as me?Is this what the BTC-community wanted? That bitcoin became an alternative dollar? In what sense? To print endlessly? Or for the whole world to depend on bitcoin, while the US becomes the world BTC-hub? I think you are very wrong and we don't need this at all. Let bitcoin remain what it is, and not an analogue or alternative to dirty greenbacks.By placing great hopes on one president and one country, you are giving power over bitcoin into their hands.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMWe've already seen how Bitcoin reached several new all-time highs as soon as the news broke out of the new President of the United States. The counting of votes is still going on in several states but the majority that he got suggests he is the new President of the USA. I am considering Trump as the new President of the US, who has the power to promote Bitcoin and make it a new option to USD. Do you think in the same way as me?If there is anyone that will be forever remember in the crypto space is nobody but Donald Trump, I don't know who gave him the strategy to take Bitcoin community along with him but the person did well and the fact that he still willing to keep to the promise he maid is a great one for everyone that is holding Bitcoin right. This is just one president effects, imagine what is going to happened when other countries do the same, the market will be above any other asset.So far so good, we have seen $100k and that's a good start, the next phycological price is definitely $1M and it's just a matter of time, it will get there provided that they don't screw us again. Right now, I'm not even sure if other countries will be seeing the bad side of Bitcoin like they used to raid miners back in the days, US backing Bitcoin simply means one thing, forward forever even if the market correct later in the future.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: Quote from: TheUltraElite on December 05, 2024, 01:54:38 PMOnly time can tell us if their support at the current stage is genuine or part of their plan to get rich. Deep down we all know that it's all likely a plan to get rich and make more profits. I think to an extent , the era of having the person with the true intent of the concept of being a core supporter of bitcoin is quite gone. These days people only promote or assist adoptions in projects they are sure has a high chance of them benefiting from it. Most times I don't like to coin down discussions like this to bitcoin price but sometimes it like you can't separate them.Is it just me or does anyone else notice the fact that bitcoin's price movement is starting to look Centralised. Now I'm saying this because the recent skyrockets and jumps in price happening based on sometimes political moves and other times moves of big firms.

comments.author: betswift
comments.body: Quote from: m2017 on December 05, 2024, 05:42:46 PMQuote from: pakhitheboss on December 05, 2024, 01:20:53 PMIt seems he is very much invested in Bitcoin, and this could trigger another bull run. News of him winning the election has already triggered a surge in Bitcoin's price. As a Bitcoin holder, I believe that a new rally is coming, and I anticipate that the price of Bitcoin will surpass $150,000 before the end of 2024.We've already seen how Bitcoin reached several new all-time highs as soon as the news broke out of the new President of the United States. The counting of votes is still going on in several states but the majority that he got suggests he is the new President of the USA. I am considering Trump as the new President of the US, who has the power to promote Bitcoin and make it a new option to USD. Do you think in the same way as me?Is this what the BTC-community wanted? That bitcoin became an alternative dollar? In what sense? To print endlessly? Or for the whole world to depend on bitcoin, while the US becomes the world BTC-hub? I think you are very wrong and we don't need this at all. Let bitcoin remain what it is, and not an analogue or alternative to dirty greenbacks.By placing great hopes on one president and one country, you are giving power over bitcoin into their hands.It's a system outside of the control - it's an alternative, but not an analog to the fiat.It's its counterpart - better in many spheres, and lacking in some, which is fine and dandy as long as it stays decentralized and being developed.

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: Mia Chloe on December 05, 2024, 05:55:23 PMQuote from: TheUltraElite on December 05, 2024, 01:54:38 PMOnly time can tell us if their support at the current stage is genuine or part of their plan to get rich. Most times I don't like to coin down discussions like this to bitcoin price but sometimes it like you can't separate them.Is it just me or does anyone else notice the fact that bitcoin's price movement is starting to look Centralised. Now I'm saying this because the recent skyrockets and jumps in price happening based on sometimes political moves and other times moves of big firms. Big guys and firms do say lots of stuff and give the final push to what was already in motion after the halving, the cycle naturally came, if it weren't for Trump, there would be something else that would of started it.Don't feel like you 100%, but I see why you do feel that way.

comments.author: hero_the_bossman

If US govt do legislation that will allow use of cryptocurrency in USA then whole world will revise its policy towards cryptocurrency. It's a positive sign that President (Elect) has welcomed Bitcoin 100k$ price and if there are few more tweets like that from Mr. Trump then we might see 150k$ before the arrival of new year. We can't rely on people like that to do better for the space, but yeah, we can't ignore the fact that they sometimes push the cogs in the bullish directionÂ   They change people's minds, and the direction would remain the same for BTC. Growth and natural increase of demand for it.

comments.author: FortuneFollower
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on December 05, 2024, 04:44:47 PMThe bull run is already here, and I don't anticipate or expect much from what we all are expecting from Bitcoin after his winnings. $150k is a price we can reach in due time; it's just a matter of time before we can get there.Â The push up yesterday to this morning was unpredictable for me, and it even moved to the level of $104k before I could even realise that we had touched $100k. If the pump continues with this speed, we might reach $110k even before we get to the 3rd week of this month.As you've seen - there would be dips that would halt that new ATH that we anticipate, but I think it will be to no avail, we will still get there eventually.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Quote from: Antotena on December 05, 2024, 05:53:30 PMIf there is anyone that will be forever remember in the crypto space is nobody but Donald TrumpWhat?Satoshi, as a Bitcoin inventor? nope.Hal Finney, as a Bitcoin developer, the first person who received Bitcoin by Satoshi, the first person who run Bitcoin node? nope.Laszlo Hanyecz, the first person who use Bitcoin to purchase something? nope.While Donald Trump, not a Bitcoin developer, was once not a Bitcoin supporter and say Bitcoin isn't a money, but now claiming to support Bitcoin because he want to get votes from Bitcoin enthusiast.
